      public void renderImage()

    • getClosestPoint

      private Intersectable.GeoPoint getClosestPoint​(java.util.List<Intersectable.GeoPoint> intersectionPoints)
      Finding the closest point to the P0 of the camera.
      Parameters:
      intersectionPoints - list of points, the function should find from this list the closet point to P0 of the camera in the scene.
      Returns:
      the closest point to the camera

    • calcColor

      private Color calcColor​(java.util.List<Ray> rays, double size, int level)
      recursive faction that calculate the color for pixel with depth of field and performance improvement adaptive supesampling
      Parameters:
      rays - - list of rays
      size - - the size of the square for the color calculation
      level - - the level for the recursion.
      Returns:
      the color of the pixel

    • calcColor

      private Color calcColor​(java.util.List<Ray> rays)
      Wraps calcColor (GeoPoint gp, Ray inRay). gets a list of rays and makes an average of all colors that come back from calcColor for each ray. When a depth of field does not work there will only be one ray in the list and when it operates there will be a number of rays as defined in the camera.
      Parameters:
      rays - - the list of rays from pixel.
      Returns:
      the color of the pixel

    • calcColor

      private Color calcColor​(Intersectable.GeoPoint gp, Ray inRay)
      calculate the color at the point call the Recursive function
      Parameters:
      gp - point and geometry
      inRay - the ray to the point
      Returns:
      color intensity

    • calcColor

      private Color calcColor​(Intersectable.GeoPoint gp, Ray inRay, int level, double k)
      Calculate the color intensity in a point-Recursive function
      Parameters:
      gp - intersection the point for which the color is required
      inRay - the ray to the point
      level - for the stop condition of the recursive.
      k - -a value for the recursion.
      Returns:
      the color intensity

    • unshaded

      public boolean unshaded​(LightSource lightSource, Vector l, Vector n, Intersectable.GeoPoint gp)
      A non-shading test between a point and a light source
      Parameters:
      l - - from light source to point (GP)
      n - -normal of geometry in point (gp)
      gp - - the point of the geometry
      lightSource - -the light source
      Returns:
      if the point is shaded

    • transparency

      Parameters:
      lightSource - - thre light source
      l - - the light direction
      n - - the normal in the point
      gp - - the shaded point
      Returns:
      the level of shading in the point

      private boolean sign​(double val)

    • calcSpecular

      private Color calcSpecular​(double ks, Vector l, Vector n, double nl, Vector v, double nShininess, Color ip)
      Calculate Specular component of light reflection.
      Parameters:
      ks - specular component coef
      l - direction from light to point
      n - normal to surface at the point
      nl - dot-product n*l
      v - direction from point of view to point
      nShininess - shininess level
      ip - light intensity at the point
      Returns:
      specular component light effect at the point

    • calcDiffusive

      private Color calcDiffusive​(double kd, double nl, Color ip)
      Calculate Diffusive component of light reflection.
      Parameters:
      kd - diffusive component coef
      nl - dot-product n*l
      ip - light intensity at the point
      Returns:
      diffusive component of light reflection
